availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Litton Bostick (Nashville, Tennesee, attorney and soldier)

body.p: Nashville, Tennesee, attorney and soldier. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth C. Bostick. Father of William T. Bostick, Harden P. Bostick, and Joseph Bostick. Attorney in Nashville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Davidson County, Nashville, Ward 4, p. 131.
Find A Grave, "John Litton Bostick (May 6, 1826-July 29, 1864)," Memorial #20841887, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/20841887 (accessed September 26, 2018).
